amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 118-308 to ensure that the whole milk served in schools can be organic or non-organic.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luna amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luna amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luna amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
